title: Audit Employee Turnover Data and Trends
description: An operational auditor analyzes employee turnover data to identify potential systemic issues.

tasks.description: Obtain employee turnover data for the past two years from the HR system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor has the complete turnover dataset.

tasks.description: Analyze the data by department, manager, and tenure to identify any hotspots or trends.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis reveals that one specific department has a turnover rate three times higher than the company average.

tasks.description: Review the exit interview data for the high-turnover department to identify common themes and root causes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The exit interview data points to poor management and a lack of career development as the primary reasons for leaving.
